PAGE_TITLE: The Commenting System for Millions of Comments - FastComments
META_DESCRIPTION: FastComments handles millions of comments with ease. Real-time commenting, seamless migrations, and moderation at scale for the largest communities.
HERO_DESCRIPTION: From 10,000 to 10,000,000+ comments, FastComments delivers real-time performance, seamless migrations, and powerful moderation at any scale.
DISTRIBUTION_SUBTITLE: FastComments powers communities of every size, from growing blogs to the largest publishers on the web.
MIGRATION_SUBTITLE: We have migrated millions of comments from every major platform. Your data arrives intact, threaded, and ready to go.
PERF_REALTIME_TEXT: Live commenting with instant updates across all connected clients, whether you have 100 or 100,000 concurrent viewers.
PERF_EDGE_TEXT: Comments and media served from edge locations worldwide via our own CDN infrastructure for minimal latency.
PERF_THREADS_TEXT: Efficiently render and navigate deeply nested comment threads with thousands of replies without performance degradation.
PERF_MODERATION_TEXT: Automated spam filtering, keyword rules, and bulk moderation tools designed for high-volume communities.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Join the sites that trust FastComments with millions of comments.
